title: ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData.ModifyInstance
description: Modifies the specified pattern instance with the specified distances in Directions 1 and 2 in this linear component pattern feature.
signature:

   System.Int32

,

D1Distance
,

IsD1OffsetFromNominal
,

,

IsD2OffsetFromNominal

parameters.name: D1Distance
parameters.description: Distance from the pattern seed in Direction 1

parameters.name: IsD1OffsetFromNominal
parameters.description: True if D1Distance is the offset from the nominal position of Instance, false if not

parameters.name: D2Distance
parameters.description: Distance from the pattern seed in Direction 2

parameters.name: IsD2OffsetFromNominal
parameters.description: True if D2Distance is the offset from the nominal position of Instance, false if not

returns: True if the pattern instance is modified successfully, false if not
remarks:
To calculate Instance:
Ensure that
ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData::D2PatternSeedOnly
is set to false.
Calculate:
For a bi-directional pattern:
I
=
n2
* (
i
- 1) + (
j
- 1)
For a uni-directional pattern:
I
=
i
- 1
where:
I
= pattern instance number
n2
= number of instances in Direction 2
i
= index for Direction 1
j
= index for Direction 2
In the pattern's PropertyManager, find
n2
in the
Direction 2
> Spacing and Instances > Number of instances
field and find [
i,j
] in the
Modified Instances
section.
